General.Name: DV8 Public Company Limited
General.Description: DV8 Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production of television satellite programs in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Media-Advertising, Sale, and Construction. It also supplies, produces, and co-produces point"of"sale advertising media, event management, and online media. In addition, the company produces and sells wooden products. The company was formerly known as Demeter Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to DV8 Public Company Limited in September 2020. DV8 Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
